title: The Oath of Love
overview: Adapted from the novel "Entrust the Rest of My Life to You" (余生，请多指教) by Bo Lin Shi Jiang (柏林石匠).Lin Zhi Xiao is a 21-year-old cellist who studies music in her third year of university. She has a lively and cheerful character.Gu Wei is a 31-year-old gastroenterologist, wise and lonely.The story begins when Lin Zhi Xian's father is hospitalized for cancer. She has no choice but to give up working abroad to take care of him. Gu Wei is her father's doctor, and the girl falls in love with him.Two versions available: 32 episodes (TV) ; 29 episodes (online/DVD).
